verses.text: In the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* began \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elah|strong="H0425"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, but not as the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that were \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

¶ Against him came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Shalmaneser|strong="H8022"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*; and \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* became his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H7725"\w* him \w presents|strong="H4503"\w*.\f + \fr 17.3 \ft gave: Heb. rendered\f*\f + \fr 17.3 \ft presents: or, tribute\f*

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* in \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w*: for he had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w So|strong="H5471"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* no \w present|strong="H4503"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, as \add he had done\add* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w*: therefore the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* shut him \w up|strong="H6113"\w*, and \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* him in \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 17.4 \ft present: or, tribute\f*

¶ Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* it \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

¶ In the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H1540"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w away|strong="H1540"\w* into \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and \w placed|strong="H3427"\w* them in \w Halah|strong="H2477"\w* and in \w Habor|strong="H2249"\w* \add by\add* the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of \w Gozan|strong="H1470"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*.

For \add so\add* it was, that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which had brought them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and had \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*,

And \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cast \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which they had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did \w secretly|strong="H2644"\w* \add those\add* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* that \add were\add* not right against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and they \w built|strong="H1129"\w* them high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* in all their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, from the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of the \w watchmen|strong="H5341"\w* to the \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

And they set them \w up|strong="H5324"\w* \w images|strong="H4676"\w* and \w groves|strong="H0842"\w* in every \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, and under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*:\f + \fr 17.10 \ft images: Heb. statues\f*

And there they burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* in all the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, as \add did\add* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* carried \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them; and \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* to provoke the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*:

For they \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, whereof the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye shall not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

Yet the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w by|strong="H3027"\w* all the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \add and by\add* all the \w seers|strong="H2374"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye from your \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \add and\add* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, according to all the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and which I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to you \w by|strong="H3027"\w* my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.\f + \fr 17.13 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*

Notwithstanding they would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, but \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* their \w necks|strong="H6203"\w*, like to the \w neck|strong="H6203"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, that did not \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And they \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that he \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and his \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w* which he \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* against them; and they \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, and became \w vain|strong="H1891"\w*, and went \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that \add were\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them, \add concerning\add* whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* them, that they should not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* like them.

And they \w left|strong="H5800"\w* all the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them molten \w images|strong="H4541"\w*, \add even\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w calves|strong="H5695"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w grove|strong="H0842"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.

And they caused their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w used|strong="H7080"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* and \w enchantments|strong="H5172"\w*, and \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* themselves to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to provoke him to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.

Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* them out of his \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*: there was none \w left|strong="H7604"\w* but the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* only.

Also \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* not the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, but \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* which they \w made|strong="H6213"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* all the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* them, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w spoilers|strong="H8154"\w*, until he had \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* them out of his \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

For he \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; and they made \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*: and \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w drave|strong="H5080"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and made them \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sin|strong="H2401"\w*.

For the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in all the \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* which he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*; they \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from them;

Until the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of his \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, as he had \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*. So was \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* carried \w away|strong="H1540"\w* out of their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w* to \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add men\add* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and from \w Cuthah|strong="H3575"\w*, and from \w Ava|strong="H5755"\w*, and from \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, and from \w Sepharvaim|strong="H5617"\w*, and \w placed|strong="H3427"\w* \add them\add* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* instead of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and they \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof.

And \add so\add* it was at the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of their \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* there, \add that\add* they \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* not the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: therefore the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* among them, which \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \add some\add* of them.

Wherefore they \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which thou hast \w removed|strong="H1540"\w*, and \w placed|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: therefore he hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w lions|strong="H0738"\w* among them, and, behold, they \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* them, because they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Carry|strong="H3212"\w* thither \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* whom ye \w brought|strong="H1540"\w* from thence; and let them \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* there, and let him \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* them the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Then \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* whom they had carried \w away|strong="H1540"\w* from \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and \w taught|strong="H3384"\w* them how they should \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Howbeit every \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of their own, and \w put|strong="H3240"\w* \add them\add* in the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* which the \w Samaritans|strong="H8118"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, every \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* in their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* wherein they \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w Succoth-benoth|strong="H5524"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Cuth|strong="H3575"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w Nergal|strong="H5370"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w Ashima|strong="H0807"\w*,

And the \w Avites|strong="H5757"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w Nibhaz|strong="H5026"\w* and \w Tartak|strong="H8662"\w*, and the \w Sepharvites|strong="H5616"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* in \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* to \w Adrammelech|strong="H0152"\w* and \w Anammelech|strong="H6048"\w*, the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Sepharvaim|strong="H5617"\w*.

So they \w feared|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* unto themselves of the \w lowest|strong="H7098"\w* of them \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, which \w sacrificed|strong="H6213"\w* for them in the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

They \w feared|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* their own \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, after the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* whom they carried \w away|strong="H1540"\w* from thence.\f + \fr 17.33 \ft whom…: or, who carried them away from thence\f*

Unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w do|strong="H6213"\w* after the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w manners|strong="H4941"\w*: they \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* not the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, neither \w do|strong="H6213"\w* they after their \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, or after their \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*, or after the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* and \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, whom he \w named|strong="H7760"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;

With whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall not \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, nor \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* yourselves to them, nor \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, nor \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to them:

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who brought you \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* and a stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, him shall ye \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, and him shall ye \w worship|strong="H7812"\w*, and to him shall ye do \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w*.

And the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and the \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*, and the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*, which he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* for you, ye shall \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for \w evermore|strong="H3117"\w*; and ye shall not \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

And the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that I have \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with you ye shall not \w forget|strong="H7911"\w*; neither shall ye \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* ye shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*; and he shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* you out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of all your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.
Howbeit they did not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w*, but they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* after their \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*.

So these \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w feared|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* their graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w*, both their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and their \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: as \w did|strong="H6213"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, so \w do|strong="H6213"\w* they unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
